languages.text: "Благодаря бойцам сержанта Малгара мы сможем организовать толпу напуганных {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}простолюдинов{/d} и не дать им перегрузить наши шаттлы. Однако я сомневаюсь, что среди спасенных ими людей будет хотя бы один высокородный".

"Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."
languages.original_text: "Благодаря бойцам сержанта Малгара мы сможем организовать толпу напуганных {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}простолюдинов{/d} и не дать им перегрузить наши шаттлы. Однако я сомневаюсь, что среди спасенных ими людей будет хотя бы один высокородный".

traits.locale_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

"Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

"Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

"Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened commoners and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

languages.text: “有了马尔加军士的部队，我们可以引导受到惊吓的{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}平民{/d}，防止他们一拥而上，让穿梭机超载。不过，我怀疑这群人之中恐怕不会有来自贵族阶层的人。”
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: “有了马尔加军士的部队，我们可以引导受到惊吓的平民，防止他们一拥而上，让穿梭机超载。不过，我怀疑这群人之中恐怕不会有来自贵族阶层的人。”

languages.text: 「マルガー軍曹の兵士のおかげで、怯えた{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}一般市民{/d}の群れに対処し、シャトルの過負荷を防ぐことができています。ですが、その市民の中にハイボーンが紛れていないとは言えません」
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: 「マルガー軍曹の兵士のおかげで、怯えた庶民の群れを対処し、シャトルへの過負荷を防ぐことができます。ですが、その市民の中にハイボーンが紛れていないとは言えません」
「マルガー軍曹の兵士のおかげで、怯えた{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}一般市民{/d}の群れに対処し、シャトルの過負荷を防ぐことができています。ですが、その市民の中にハイボーンが紛れていないとは言えません」

languages.text: "Dank der Truppen von Sergeant Malgar können wir die verängstigten {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}Bürger{/d} auch in großer Zahl davon abhalten, dass sie unsere Shuttles überlasten. Allerdings dürften wir darunter keinen einzigen Vertreter eines höheren Standes finden."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: "Dank der Truppen von Sergeant Malgar können wir die verängstigten Bürger auch in großer Zahl davon abhalten, dass sie unsere Shuttles überlasten. Allerdings dürften wir darunter keinen einzigen Vertreter eines höheren Standes finden."

languages.text: « Grâce aux troupes du sergent Malgar, nous devrions être en mesure de canaliser les foules de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}roturiers{/d} et éviter qu'elles ne prennent d'assaut nos navettes. Cependant, je doute que nous trouvions le moindre citoyen de haute extraction parmi eux. »
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: « Grâce aux troupes du sergent Malgar, nous devrions être en mesure de canaliser les foules de roturiers et éviter qu'elles ne prennent d'assaut nos navettes. Cependant, je doute que nous trouvions le moindre citoyen de haute extraction parmi eux. »

languages.text: «Gracias a las tropas del sargento Malgar, podemos controlar a la muchedumbre de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}plebeyos{/d} asustados y evitar que sobrecarguen las lanzaderas. Sin embargo, dudo que encontremos a un solo ciudadano de alta cuna entre ellos».
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: «Gracias a las tropas del sargento Malgar, podemos controlar a la muchedumbre de plebeyos asustados y evitar que sobrecarguen las lanzaderas. Sin embargo, dudo que encontremos a un solo ciudadano de alta cuna entre ellos».

languages.text: "Çavuş Malgar'ın birlikleri sayesinde korkmuş {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}avam kitlesini{/d} yönetebilir ve mekiklerimize tıkışmalarını önleyebiliriz. Lakin aralarında tek bir asilzade bile bulacağımızdan şüpheliyim."
languages.original_text: "Thanks to Sergeant Malgar's troops, we can manage the crowds of frightened {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportCommonersSaved}commoners{/d} and prevent them from overloading our shuttles. However, I doubt we will find even one highborn citizen among them."

traits.locale_text: "Çavuş Malgar'ın birlikleri sayesinde korkmuş avam kitlesini yönetebilir ve mekiklerimize tıkışmalarını önleyebiliriz. Lakin aralarında tek bir soylu bile bulacağımızdan şüpheliyim."
